Purpose: To measure the total magnesium excreted over 24 hours, assisting in the evaluation of magnesium metabolism and renal function.
Container: Clean, appropriately labeled 24-hour urine collection container (kept refrigerated during collection)
Equipment: Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometer (ICP-MS) or Atomic Absorption Spectrometer (AAS), with supporting laboratory balance and volumetric glassware
